ScoreRangeClassification.name: ScoreRangeClassification
ScoreRangeClassification.description: Represents the different score ranges of a score category and how scores in those ranges are classified or interpreted.

ClassificationName.description: The interpretation or classification of scores in the specified range.

ColorHexadecimalCode.description: The hexadecimal code for the color that represents the range and its interpretation. Tip Be mindful of cultural differences when you choose a color code. Different colors mean different things in different cultures.

RangeEndValue.description: The end point of a score range classification.

RangeStartValue.description: The start point of a score range classification.

ScoreCategoryId.description: The score category whose score range and classification are defined.
